channel.title: --------->help<------
channel.description: hey seriously, im tryna get this server up, but it wont work.im using hippiescape v2 heres run.bat [code]@echo off title Hippiescape color 0a "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_02\bin\java.exe" -cp .;Hippiescape.jar server pause [/code] i get "the path could not be specified" error.

item.title: --------->help<------
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

you don’t have to put .exe

Read full topic

item.title: --------->help<------
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

[quote=“Final Dawn, post:13, topic:187199”]Try puting this in your run.bat and see if it works

@echo off title Hippiescape color 0a "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_4\bin\java.exe" -cp .;Hippiescape.jar server pause

and use run.bat to run your server[/quote]

Of coarse that didnt work. he wants to run it not compile it…

vato:

nope, didnt work

Make sure you have a JRE java.

To find out… Goto:

Start - > Run
Type: c:\program files\java

Now see if there is a folder with a jre name.

If there is good, if not download a jre.

Use this for your run.bat

@echo off
echo Running server
title Your Server Title Here
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause

Read full topic

item.title: --------->help<------
item.dc:creator: @Final_Dawn Final Dawn
item.description:
@Final_Dawn wrote:

Try puting this in your run.bat and see if it works

@echo off title Hippiescape color 0a "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_4\bin\java.exe" -cp .;Hippiescape.jar server pause

and use run.bat to run your server

Read full topic

item.title: --------->help<------
item.dc:creator: @LeScape LeScape
item.description:
@LeScape wrote:

And you’re using a classpath in run.exe why?

java -cp .;./jython.jar -Xmx1024m server

Read full topic

item.title: --------->help<------
item.dc:creator: @vato vato
item.description:
@vato wrote:

yeah, but then it does same thing, The system cannot find the path specified.
Press any key to continue . . .[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 07, 2008, 08:47:28 PM[/size][hr]my run.bat is…in my…source…?

Read full topic

item.title: --------->help<------
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Where exactly is your run.bat

Why are you running a .jar… to run a server.

JRE = Java Runtime Enviorment

which is used to run java things. while

JDK = Java Devlopment Kit

Which is used for making things. and compileing.

[quote=“LeScape, post:8, topic:187199”]Classpath:

"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" *.java [/quote]

He is running his server, not compiling.

Read full topic

item.title: --------->help<------
item.dc:creator: @Final_Dawn Final Dawn
item.description:
@Final_Dawn wrote:

[quote=“Bryanc, post:6, topic:187199”][quote author=Freelillou link=topic=249753.msg2094743#msg2094743 date=1204961823]
change jre to jdk
[/quote]

No just stop talking… He is RUNNING his server

what?
i have jdk6 update 4.
heres my classpath and path
classpath

CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_4\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_4\bin

Use this instead:

@echo off title Hippiescape color 0a "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_04\bin\java.exe" -cp .;Hippiescape.jar server pause

Like I said you just change the jre to the type you have…[/quote]

Actually if you look at his CLASSPATH it says that his java is located at

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_4\bin

meaning that his run.bat should say

@echo off title Hippiescape color 0a "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_4\bin\java.exe" -cp .;Hippiescape.jar server pause \

because

jdk1.6.0_4

is the type of java he has

Read full topic

item.title: --------->help<------
item.dc:creator: @vato vato
item.description:
@vato wrote:

uh JRE?
im not…sure what JRE is…how do i check it.
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 07, 2008, 08:43:34 PM[/size][hr]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . .
thats what happened when i used bryanc

Read full topic

item.title: --------->help<------
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Freelillou:

change jre to jdk

No just stop talking… He is RUNNING his server

[quote=“vato, post:4, topic:187199”]what?
i have jdk6 update 4.
heres my classpath and path
classpath

CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_4\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_4\bin

Use this instead:

@echo off title Hippiescape color 0a "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_04\bin\java.exe" -cp .;Hippiescape.jar server pause

Like I said you just change the jre to the type you have…

Read full topic

If not change this:
